sms.monitoring.news
Class NewsMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      sms.monitoring.news.NewsMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NewsMonitor
extends java.lang.Thread

Monitors database news table to detect changes arriving in order to distribute the news.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Barbara M. Rodeker
